translations: n.海中怪兽；庞然大物；巨轮

phrs.translation: 利卫旦, 列维尔坦, 利未安森
巨鲸之心, 之心, 利维坦的心脏
烈焰战轮, 烈焰巨兽, 烈焰海兽
麦尔维尔鲸, 麦尔利维坦鲸, 利维坦鲸
孵化利维坦, 铼, 㬻

sentences.sentence: Democracy survived the Civil War and the developing industrial leviathan and struggled on into the twentieth century.
sentences.translation: 民主经历了内战和发展着的庞大工业体系而幸存下来并挣扎进入20世纪。

sentences.sentence: The simile is there ostensibly to compare Satan with the great sea beast, leviathan.
sentences.translation: 这个明喻很明显是将撒旦和凶猛的海中野兽利维坦进行了对比。

sentences.sentence: It is most of all pride that Hobbes wants to tame and of course the very title of his book, Leviathan.
sentences.translation: 霍布斯想要控制的是所有的骄傲，当然还有他的书《利维坦》的题目。
